name: Ys FF New Tab Page
description: For use with New Tab Tools extension. recommended settings. 70+ logos in black or white.
additional_info:
Album of backgrounds [imgur.com]

Logos: Reddit, Wikipedia, BBC, Reuters, MetaFilter, The Guardian, The Telegraph, The Onion, Forbes, The Economist, WSJ, DuckDuckGo, Google, Gmail (old), ProtonMail, Hushmail, Tutanota, Yahoo, Facebook, Apple, Twitter, Tumblr, WordPress, YouTube, Vimeo, Netflix, Twitch, IMDb, TMDb, Rotten Tomatoes, Sound Cloud, Spotify, Deezer, DeviantArt, Imgur, Flickr, InterfaceLift, Dribbble, Pintrest, Steam, Humble Bundle, GOG, Amazon, eBay, PayPal, ArsTechnica, TechCrunch, The Verge, Wired, BoingBoing, Polygon, The Next Web, A.V.Club, Variety, RockPaperShotgun, Sky, Euro Sports, FlashScore, TPB, Deluge, Plex, IFTTT, Diigo, Delicious, GitHub, SourceForge, SuperUser, jsFiddle, CodePen, Sketchfab, Dropbox, Duolingo, Waitrose, SeriousEats, AGDQ, BT Sport, Barclays, HSBC, Lloyds Bank, WolframAlpha.
